snippet: We are all under the judgment of God and the present war may be the instrument of His wrath used to bring about the salvation of man, Mgr. Fulton J. Sheen of the Catholic University, Washington, declared......

headline.main: SHEEN SEES THE WAR AIMED AT SALVATION; Says It Will Be Worth While if It Saves One Otherwise Lost Soul

lead_paragraph: We are all under the judgment of God and the present war may be the instrument of His wrath used to bring about the salvation of man, Mgr. Fulton J. Sheen of the Catholic University, Washington, declared...
